item.description:
Hello all,

This month, we will celebrate out first Professionals of Color Business Spotlight!

The Professionals of Color Business Spotlight is an opportunity for our members to give a 10-15 minute presentation of their business or service to the rest of the group. The presentation can consist of a slide presentation, product demonstration or any other activity that gets the word out about the wealth of products and services offered by our TALENTED and INDUSTRIOUS group members.

This month's Professionals of Color Business Spotlight will feature the following three businesses and will focus on the theme of "Wellness."

Charisma (T&J Enterprises)
"A Healthier, More Vibrant YOU Inside and Out!"
Tammy Wong - Beauty adviser

Reborn Body
Kenny Hyde - Personal Wellness Coach

BodyPeace
"Know When To Surrender - Make Peace With Your Body"
Cynthia Rodriguez - Massage Therapist

Hope to see you all there!

Please feel free to contact me via email or by phone (617-686-5963) with any questions or to sign up for future Professionals of Color Business Spotlights!

Best,

Qiana
item.name: Professionals of Color Business Spotlight!
